title: Rachel Reeves – 2022 Comments on Government Voting Against Windfall Tax
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves on Twitter on 17 May 2022.
content:
Tonight, every Conservative MP who voted against a windfall tax on oil and gas producer profits, has sent a clear message. They will not put working people first, and they have no answer on the cost of living crisis.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
